title: Colin Firth back as Mr Darcy in new Bridget Jones movie
text:
Colin Firth back as Mr Darcy in new Bridget Jones movie Colin Firth back as Mr Darcy in new Bridget Jones movie 
  
Colin Firth has been spotted filming the much-anticipated third instalment of the Bridget Jones franchise, titled Bridget Jones’s Baby. 
Firth, who plays Mark Darcy, was photographed looking dapper in a navy suit on set in Islington, north London. 
His sartorial prowess aside, fans may not be pleased to hear that the star is not wearing a wedding ring in the photos. Colin Firth on set in Islington, London, during filming of Bridget Jones’s Baby, the third instalment of the Bridget Jones franchise.(Anthony Devlin/PA Wire 
The second film, Bridget Jones: The Edge Of Reason, ended with Bridget getting engaged to Mark Darcy. 
Actress Renee Zellweger is back to reprise her famous role, 14 years after the first movie was released. 
As to whether this hints at any upcoming storylines is not clear, as author Helen Fielding has not released much information. 
In the last few days Zellweger was photographed sporting a large prosthetic bump as she filmed scenes outside Sainsbury’s supermarket in Woolwich, south London. (Daniel Leal-Olivas/PA) 
Gray’s Anatomy star Patrick Dempsey confirmed he will be starring in the movie via an Instagram photo posted in September. 
He is rumoured to be playing a new love interest. 
The first official image from the movie was released last week, and shows Zellweger smiling from behind an iPad. Share article 
Fielding released her third Bridget Jones novel, Mad About The Boy, in October 2013, but it is not clear if the new movie will follow the same plot. Promoted Stories
